casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

November 9, 2009

[Cite as 11/09/2009 Case Announcements, 2009-Ohio-5883.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-1987. State v. Feldman.

Lake App. No. 2009-L-052, 2009-Ohio-5765. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
